1.0.name: wordpress/skoffer-screencast-recorder
1.0.description: The plugin adds a button to the TinyMCE editor which can be used to start a Java based screen recorder. You can use this screen recorder to record your PC screen, including sound, in unlimited high resolutions and not limited video lengths. When you click on the screen recorder's save button, the new screencast gets uploaded into the Skoffer.com computer cloud and automatically inserted into your blog post. This makes screencasting easier than including images to a blog post. You don't need to register anywhere to use this plugin. Just install it and you are able to record screencasts with resolution of 1600x1200 pixels or higher in seconds.
